arts.ttl: Sir Jim Ratcliffe’s INEOS Reach Settlement with Tottenham Over £11m+ Sponsorship Dispute
arts.sum: Sir Jim Ratcliffe’s INEOS has reached an out-of-court settlement with Tottenham Hotspur to end an £11m+ legal dispute.

arts.ttl: Amorim admits Man Utd ‘problem’ ahead of Spurs clash
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim admits that a lack of clean sheets is a “problem” that Man Utd need to address this season. The Red Devils have conceded 18 goals in all competitions and kept a clean sheet just once, in their 2-0 win over Sunderland at Old Trafford last month. arts.ttl: Amorim delivers Man United injury update ahead of Tottenham showdown
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim says that there is "no change" to his team's injury situation ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash with Tottenham Hotspur.

arts.ttl: Tottenham vs Manchester United Prediction: Can Utd Avenge Europa League Defeat?
